text: Khenpo Karma Tharchin Rinpoche (3 April 1924Khenpo Karthar Rinpoche, Karma Chakme's Mountain Dharma, Volume 2, p. 25 - 6 October 2019), widely known Khenpo Karthar Rinpoche, was a senior lama of the Karma Kagyu school of Tibetan Buddhism. He was abbot of Karma Triyana Dharmachakra (KTD) Monastery in Woodstock, New York from 1976 until his death in 2019. He was born in Kham, Tibet. Rinpoche died at his home in Woodstock on 6 October 2019 at the age of 95.KTD Abbot Khenpo Karthar Rinpoche passes on ==References== ==Other websites== *KTD web site: Biography of Khenpo Karthar Rinpoche *Snow Lion Publications: Biography of Khenpo Karthar Rinpoche Category:1924 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Educators Category:Tibetan Buddhist lamas
title: Khenpo Karthar Rinpoche
